segments.text: I had it right here a minute ago , Mr . Emory . Umm . Just a minute ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Christine , I know you ’ re new here and there ’ s a lot to learn , but you are going to have to learn to keep your work in better order . We can ’ t afford to lose an important document .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . I apologize for that . Here ’ s the file you were looking for , Mr . Emory .
segments.speaker: S2
